name: Michael Galero
text: I can't pick just one, but here's my short list:    Avengers: Infinity War  Isle of Dogs  Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse  Three Billboards outside Ebbing Missouri    From what I've heard, I'm guessing Blackkklansman will probably join the list when I see it.

source_obj.text: I can't pick just one, but here's my short list:    Avengers: Infinity War  Isle of Dogs  Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse  Three Billboards outside Ebbing Missouri    From what I've heard, I'm guessing Blackkklansman will probably join the list when I see it.
